overview: A run-of-the-mill theater actor gets involved in a thought-out audition for government propaganda. A director and his crew lead the audition in a conventional manner. Meanwhile, a famous figure seems to be watching the filmed audition. After being satisfied with the inhumanity that was filmed, deceit and manipulation take place in a room filled with cigarette smoke, heavy liquor, and hard cash joyfully being consumed by the pigs in the pen.
title: Pig's Game
